summary: Kerberos 5 and IBM MQ used by IBM MQ Operator and Queue Manager container images are vulnerable to denial of service due to improper memory allocation, and privilege escalation which may lead to bypassing security restrictions. This bulletin identifies the steps required to address these vulnerabilities.
recommendations: For Affected Product(s) on Version(s) platforms, it is recommended to apply the latest fix, which can be downloaded from the IBM Fix Central website: https://exchange.xforce.ibmcloud.com/vulnerabilities/296012

summary: A vulnerability was identified and remediated in the IBM MaaS360 MDM for Android Application (Version 8.60 and Prior)
recommendations: For Maas360 MDM for Android App on  6.31 - 8.60 platforms, it is recommended to apply the latest fix, which can be downloaded from the IBM Fix Central website: https://www.ibm.com/docs/en/maas360?topic=guide-apps

summary: IBM App Connect Enterprise Certified Container operands are vulnerable to privilege escalation due to not limiting the unshare command.  This bulletin provides patch information to address the reported vulnerability. [CVE-2022-43915]
recommendations: For Affected Product(s) on Version(s) platforms, it is recommended to apply the latest fix, which can be downloaded from the IBM Fix Central website: https://www.ibm.com/docs/en/app-connect/containers_cd?topic=releases-upgrading-operator

summary: IBM Sterling Connect:Direct Web Service uses IBM Java SE, which is impacted by CVE-2024-39747.
recommendations: For Affected Product(s) on Version(s) platforms, it is recommended to apply the latest fix, which can be downloaded from the IBM Fix Central website: https://www.ibm.com/support/fixcentral/options?selectionBean.selectedTab=find&selection=ibm%2fOther+software%3bibm%2fOther+software%2fIBM+Connect%3aDirect+Web+Services

summary: An issue found in the IBM Security Verify Access OIDC code could allow a remote attacker to cause a Redirect URL vulerability
recommendations: For Affected Product(s) on Version(s) platforms, it is recommended to apply the latest fix, which can be downloaded from the IBM Fix Central website: https://docs.verify.ibm.com/ibm-security-verify-access/docs/containers

summary: There is a vulnerability in Manage Componenet  used by IBM Maximo Manage application in IBM Maximo Application Suite.
affected_products:
IBM Maximo Application Suite - Manage Component
MAS 8.10 - Manage 8.6.16

IBM Maximo Application Suite - Manage Component
MAS 8.11 - Manage 8.7.10

IBM Maximo Application Suite - Manage Component
MAS 9.0.0 - Manage 9.0.1
recommendations:
For IBM Maximo Application Suite - Manage Component on 
 platforms, it is recommended to apply the latest fix, which can be downloaded from the IBM Fix Central website: https://www.ibm.com/docs/en/mas-cd/continuous-delivery?topic=upgrading

summary: An authenticated developer user can utilize webMethods Integration Server to create a user through the scheduler service and then elevate that user to an administrator using runAsUser. This action provides elevated privileges for the developer user. webMethods Integration Server could potentially allow an authenticated developer user to write an OSCommand.cnf file and then execute arbitrary commands on the server. webMethods Integration Server may also allow an authenticated developer to read /../.. files, even after checkFileRead is set.
recommendations: For Affected Product(s) on Version(s) platforms, it is recommended to apply the latest fix, which can be downloaded from the IBM Fix Central website: https://documentation.softwareag.com/a_installer_and_update_manager/Using_SAG_Update_Manager_for_10-5_and_later/#page/sag-update-manager-help%2Fta-checking_for_fixes_on_empower.html%23

summary: This Security Bulletin addresses multiple vulnerabilities that have been remediated in IBM Aspera Faspex 5.0.10
recommendations: For Aspera Faspex 5 on 5.0.0 - 5.0.9 platforms, it is recommended to apply the latest fix, which can be downloaded from the IBM Fix Central website: https://www.ibm.com/support/fixcentral/swg/downloadFixes?parent=ibm%7EOther%20software&product=ibm/Other+software/IBM+Aspera+Faspex+Server&release=All&platform=All&function=fixId&fixids=ibm-aspera-faspex-5.0.10.7849.x86_64&includeRequisites=1&includeSupersedes=0&downloadMethod=http

summary: IBM Sterling Connect:Direct Web Service uses IBM Java SE, which is vulnerable to CVE-2024-39744.
recommendations: For Affected Product(s) on Version(s) platforms, it is recommended to apply the latest fix, which can be downloaded from the IBM Fix Central website: https://www.ibm.com/support/fixcentral/options?selectionBean.selectedTab=find&selection=ibm%2fOther+software%3bibm%2fOther+software%2fIBM+Connect%3aDirect+Web+Services

summary: A vulnerability caused by improper authorization checks could allow authenticated users access to sensitive information through APIs.
affected_products: IBM OpenPages with WatsonIBM OpenPages with Watson 8.3
recommendations: For Affected Product(s) on Version(s) platforms, it is recommended to apply the latest fix, which can be downloaded from the IBM Fix Central website: https://www.ibm.com/support/pages/openpages-watson-83-fix-pack-3

summary: IBM QRadar Suite software is vulnerable to information exposure through a detailed technical error message. This has been updated in the latest release and vulnerabilities have been addressed. Please follow the instructions in the Remediation/Fixes section below to update to the latest version.
recommendations: For IBM Cloud Pak for Security on 1.10.0.0 - 1.10.11.0 platforms, it is recommended to apply the latest fix, which can be downloaded from the IBM Fix Central website: https://www.ibm.com/docs/en/cloud-paks/cp-security/1.10?topic=installing-upgrading-cloud-pak-security

summary: IBM Sterling Connect:Direct Web Service uses IBM Java SE. This bulletin identifies the steps to take to address the vulnerabilities.
recommendations: For Affected Product(s) on Version(s) platforms, it is recommended to apply the latest fix, which can be downloaded from the IBM Fix Central website: https://www.ibm.com/support/fixcentral/options?selectionBean.selectedTab=find&selection=ibm%2fOther+software%3bibm%2fOther+software%2fIBM+Connect%3aDirect+Web+Services

summary: IBM Security Directory Integrator has addressed an issue where it did not perform authentication.
recommendations: For IBM Security Directory Integrator on 7.2.0 platforms, it is recommended to apply the latest fix, which can be downloaded from the IBM Fix Central website: https://www.ibm.com/docs/en/svdi/10.0.0?topic=containers-images

summary: IBM Global Configuration Management is vulnerable to archiving a global baseline by an authenticated user having improper access controls/permissions. This bulletin contains information regarding the vulnerability and remediation actions.
recommendations: For   Affected Product(s) on   Version(s) platforms, it is recommended to apply the latest fix, which can be downloaded from the IBM Fix Central website: https://www.ibm.com/support/fixcentral/swg/downloadFixes?parent=ibm%7ERational&product=ibm%2FRational%2FIBM+Engineering+Lifecycle+Management&release=7.0.2&platform=All&function=fixId&fixids=7.0.2-IBM-ELM-iFix030&includeSupersedes=0&downloadMethod=http&source=fc
